newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list News Corp and Memtec options.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list News Corp and Memtec options.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange said it would list options on American depositary receipts (ADRs) of News Corp Ltd preferred shares and Memtec Ltd on March 21.
The News Corp preferred-share ADR options will have initial strike prices of 12-1/2, 15 and 17-1/2, with expirations in April, May, July and October. Position limit is 10,500 contracts.
GHM Inc will be the specialist for News Corp options on the AMEX floor.
Memtec options will have strikes of 20, 22-1/2 and 25, with expirations in April, May, August and November. Position limit is 4,500 contracts.
LETCO-Specialist LP will be the specialist for Memtec options.
